item.title: Bitcoin Breaks All-Time High: What Does It Truly Mean?
item.description: Bitcoin has shattered its all-time high, surpassing $112,000. Three distinct personas sharply debate the growth potential driven by institutional inflows and regulatory optimism against the potential risks fueled by excessive greed and historical patterns.
